content: I cannot predict the future or make assumptions, but it's possible that discovery may decide to launch its own streaming service in the future. many traditional media companies, such as disney and nbc, have launched their own streaming services to compete with platforms like netflix and amazon prime. by creating their own streaming service, discovery would have the advantage of being able to control its content, pricing, and user experience, which could be appealing to many viewers. however, launching a streaming service is an ambitious undertaking, and requires a considerable investment in technology, marketing, and content creation. nevertheless, if discovery decides to launch its own streaming service, it would have the potential to reach a wider audience and stay competitive in a fast-changing media landscape.
